posts.description: What motivates us to work? Contrary to conventional wisdom, it isn't just money. But it's not exactly joy either. I am very pleased to announce the general availability of Windows Azure Infrastructure Services. This new service now makes it possible for customers to move applications into the cloud.

posts.caption: blogs.msdn.com
posts.description: Today is an exciting day for Microsoft, Windows Azure and all of our customers around the world.  I am very pleased to announce the general availability of Windows Azure Infrastructure Services. This new service now makes it possible for customers to move applications into the cloud.
